item.title: Preview of the Buried Sea
item.description: This week Loral takes an extended tour through the new lands found in Everquest's thirteenth expansion, the Buried Sea.

item.title: World of Warcraft: The Burning Crusade
item.description: Loral takes a step out of the world of Norrath and spends a time in the world of Azeroth and the recently opened portal to the Outlands in today's discussion of the first World of Warcraft expansion, the Burning Crusade.

item.title: EQ Expansion 13: The Buried Sea
item.description: Today Loral takes a look at the little information we have on Everquest's 13th expansion, The Buried Sea.

item.title: Massive Online Games of 2007
item.description: Loral steps back and pontificates the entire playing field of 2007 massive online game releases.

item.title: Everquest's Two Year Outlook
item.description: Today Loral takes a look out over the next two years and predicts what we may see change across the world of Norrath.

item.title: The State of the Equipment Gap
item.description: Today Loral takes a look at the current state of the equipment power gap between raiders and single-group hunters at the highest levels after the release of The Serpent's Spine.

item.title: Review of the Serpent's Spine
item.description: Two months after release, Loral takes a full look at the Serpent's Spine and discusses each of the new features found in this cyclopean expansion.

item.title: Are Massive Online Games Getting Worse?
item.description: Today Loral takes a step back and considers the past and future of massive online games. We all love instances, easy corpse recovery, shorter travel, and fancy new LFG windows, but what price do we pay for their inclusion?

item.title: The Battle of Ashengate
item.description: This week Loral takes a look at the recent change and controversy surrounding the two high-end hunting zones in The Serpent's Spine.

item.title: Three Big Changes to Everquest
item.description: In today's article, Loral discusses three big changes to Everquest: out of combat regeneration, expendable alternate advancement points, and the new tiered spell system available in the Serpent's Spine expansion.

item.title: Success Criteria for the Serpent's Spine
item.description: Today Loral takes a look at the elements required for the success of the Serpent's Spine.

item.title: Prophecy of Ro Single Group Progression Video
item.description: Based on the recent videos of Prophecy's raider end-game, Loral Ciriclight cuts up a little video showing the path of a single group hunter in Prophecy of Ro.

item.title: A Preview of the Serpent's Spine
item.description: Today Loral discusses his preview tour of the Serpent's Spine.

item.title: Should You Become a Raider?
item.description: Loral takes a look at the advantages and disadvantages of the path of the high-end raider. Should you become a raider? Read on and learn what such a choice requires.

item.title: Snapping the Serpent's Spine
item.description: In today's article, Loral discusses the recent announcement that the Serpent's Spine expansion will be download only. Say it isn't so, Joe.
